The portal back to the main dungeon is located inside the walls of Elshava, in the marked location. Every enclosed room is occupied by a random shop.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Shop Types](#Shop_Types)

  - [1.1 Sea Garden](#Sea_Garden)
  - [1.2 Fishery](#Fishery)
  - [1.3 Sand-walker's Shop](#Sand-walker.27s_Shop)
  - [1.4 Spa](#Spa)

- [2 Enemy Types](#Enemy_Types)

- [3 Portal](#Portal)

## Shop Types

### Sea Garden

**Shopkeeper**: Yurian (crab-person)

**Stock**: 40% random armor, 30% random weapons, 19% [Slime molds](/wiki/Slime_mold "Slime mold"), 10% [Living masks](/index.php?title=Living_mask\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Living mask (page does not exist)"), 1% [syllables](/wiki/Syllable "Syllable").

- Random armors will be [war hats](/wiki/War_hat "War hat"), [plate mail](/wiki/Plate_mail "Plate mail"), [scale mail](/wiki/Scale_mail "Scale mail"), [kite shields](/index.php?title=Kite_shield\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Kite shield (page does not exist)"), [cloaks](/wiki/Cloak "Cloak"), [leather armor](/wiki/Leather_armor "Leather armor"), or [living armor](/index.php?title=Living_armor\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Living armor (page does not exist)") or [barnacle armor](/index.php?title=Barnacle_armor\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Barnacle armor (page does not exist)"). Metallic armors will instead be made of shell.
- Random weapons will be [spikes](/wiki/Spike "Spike"), [spears](/wiki/Spear "Spear"), [javelins](/wiki/Javelin "Javelin"), [tridents](/wiki/Trident "Trident"), [elven daggers](/wiki/Elven_dagger "Elven dagger"), or [ranseurs](/wiki/Ranseur "Ranseur"). Weapons will be made of shell, and coated with either poison or acid.
- Slime molds will be called "algae mats" or "seaweed."

### Fishery

**Shopkeeper**: Deep one

**Stock**: 64% [Slime mold](/wiki/Slime_mold "Slime mold"), 15% [Cram rations](/wiki/Cram_ration "Cram ration"), 10% [Booze](/wiki/Booze "Booze"), 10% [Amulets](/wiki/Amulet "Amulet"), 1% [Syllables](/wiki/Syllable "Syllable").

- Random amulets will be made of gold, making them somewhat heavier than normal.
- Slime molds will be called "salted fish", "pickled fish", "fried squid", "baked clams", "live oysters", or "sea cucumbers"

### Sand-walker's Shop

**Shopkeeper**: Selkie/Seal

**Stock**: 35% random armor, 25% random weapons, 7% [tinning kits](/wiki/Tinning_kit "Tinning kit"), 7% [stethoscopes](/wiki/Stethoscope "Stethoscope"), 7% [crystal balls](/wiki/Crystal_ball "Crystal ball"), 7% [can of grease](/wiki/Can_of_grease "Can of grease"), 5% [syllables](/wiki/Syllable "Syllable"), 7% [amulet of magical breathing](/wiki/Amulet_of_magical_breathing "Amulet of magical breathing").

- Random armors will be [elven helm](/wiki/Elven_helm "Elven helm"), [high elven helm](/index.php?title=High_elven_helm\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High elven helm (page does not exist)"), [archaic helm](/index.php?title=Archaic_helm\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Archaic helm (page does not exist)"), [leather armor](/wiki/Leather_armor "Leather armor"), [leather armor](/wiki/Leather_armor "Leather armor"), [archaic plate mail](/index.php?title=Archaic_plate_mail\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Archaic plate mail (page does not exist)"), [elven mithril-coat](/wiki/Elven_mithril-coat "Elven mithril-coat"), [high elven plate](/index.php?title=High_elven_plate\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High elven plate (page does not exist)"), [elven cloak](/wiki/Elven_cloak "Elven cloak"), [oilskin cloak](/wiki/Oilskin_cloak "Oilskin cloak"), [cloak of invisibility](/wiki/Cloak_of_invisibility "Cloak of invisibility"), [buckler](/wiki/Buckler "Buckler"), [archaic gauntlets](/index.php?title=Archaic_gauntlets\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Archaic gauntlets (page does not exist)"), [gloves](/wiki/Gloves "Gloves"), [high elven gauntlets](/index.php?title=High_elven_gauntlets\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High elven gauntlets (page does not exist)"), [archaic boots](/index.php?title=Archaic_boots\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Archaic boots (page does not exist)"), or [elven boots](/wiki/Elven_boots "Elven boots")
- Random weapons will be [spear](/wiki/Spear "Spear"), [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe"), [dwarvish mattock](/wiki/Dwarvish_mattock "Dwarvish mattock"), [two handed sword](/wiki/Two_handed_sword "Two handed sword"), [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident"), [rapier](/wiki/Rapier "Rapier"), [long sword](/wiki/Long_sword "Long sword"), [crystal sword](/wiki/Crystal_sword "Crystal sword"), [high elven warsword](/index.php?title=High_elven_warsword\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "High elven warsword (page does not exist)"), or [elven broadsword](/wiki/Elven_broadsword "Elven broadsword"). All weapons **other** than crystal swords will be made of [silver](/wiki/Silver "Silver"). All weapons are sold coated in acid.

### Spa

**Shopkeeper**: Oceanid

**Stock**: 22% [potion of object detection](/wiki/Potion_of_object_detection "Potion of object detection"), 22% [mirrors](/wiki/Mirror "Mirror"), 15% [towels](/wiki/Towel "Towel"), 40% random armor, 1% [syllables](/wiki/Syllable "Syllable").

- Random armor will be [elven toga](/index.php?title=Elven_toga\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Elven toga (page does not exist)"), [gentleman's suit](/index.php?title=Gentleman%27s_suit\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Gentleman's suit (page does not exist)"), [gentlewoman's dress](/index.php?title=Gentlewoman%27s_dress\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Gentlewoman's dress (page does not exist)"), [jacket](/wiki/Jacket "Jacket"), [fedora](/wiki/Fedora "Fedora"), [stilettos](/index.php?title=Stilettos\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Stilettos (page does not exist)"), [hawaiian shirt](/wiki/Hawaiian_shirt "Hawaiian shirt"), [t-shirt](/wiki/T-shirt "T-shirt"), [victorian underwear](/wiki/Victorian_underwear "Victorian underwear"), or [black dress](/index.php?title=Black_dress\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Black dress (page does not exist)").

## Enemy Types

66.6% [fog clouds](/wiki/Fog_cloud "Fog cloud"), 16.6% [piranha](/wiki/Piranha "Piranha"), 11.1% [sea monsters](/wiki/Sea_monster "Sea monster"), 2.7% [Coure Eladrin](/wiki/Coure_Eladrin "Coure Eladrin"), 2.77% [Noviere Eladrin](/wiki/Noviere_Eladrin "Noviere Eladrin")

## Portal

The portal to the next level is located in the shallow water outside the walls of Elshava. You can use any portal detection method to find it (including wandering around the shallows until you stumble through it) or you can pay one of the shopkeepers to reveal it.

Elshava

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

The portal back to the main dungeon is located inside the walls of Elshava, in the marked location. Every enclosed room is occupied by a random shop.

Contents

  • 1 Shop Types
    • 1.1 Sea Garden
    • 1.2 Fishery
    • 1.3 Sand-walker's Shop
    • 1.4 Spa
  • 2 Enemy Types
  • 3 Portal

Shop Types

Sea Garden

Shopkeeper: Yurian (crab-person)

Stock: 40% random armor, 30% random weapons, 19% Slime molds, 10% Living masks, 1% syllables.

  • Random armors will be war hats, plate mail, scale mail, kite shields, cloaks, leather armor, or living armor or barnacle armor. Metallic armors will instead be made of shell.
  • Random weapons will be spikes, spears, javelins, tridents, elven daggers, or ranseurs. Weapons will be made of shell, and coated with either poison or acid.
  • Slime molds will be called "algae mats" or "seaweed."

Fishery

Shopkeeper: Deep one

Stock: 64% Slime mold, 15% Cram rations, 10% Booze, 10% Amulets, 1% Syllables.

  • Random amulets will be made of gold, making them somewhat heavier than normal.
  • Slime molds will be called "salted fish", "pickled fish", "fried squid", "baked clams", "live oysters", or "sea cucumbers"

Sand-walker's Shop

Shopkeeper: Selkie/Seal

Stock: 35% random armor, 25% random weapons, 7% tinning kits, 7% stethoscopes, 7% crystal balls, 7% can of grease, 5% syllables, 7% amulet of magical breathing.

  • Random armors will be elven helm, high elven helm, archaic helm, leather armor, leather armor, archaic plate mail, elven mithril-coat, high elven plate, elven cloak, oilskin cloak, cloak of invisibility, buckler, archaic gauntlets, gloves, high elven gauntlets, archaic boots, or elven boots
  • Random weapons will be spear, pick-axe, dwarvish mattock, two handed sword, trident, rapier, long sword, crystal sword, high elven warsword, or elven broadsword. All weapons other than crystal swords will be made of silver. All weapons are sold coated in acid.

Spa

Shopkeeper: Oceanid

Stock: 22% potion of object detection, 22% mirrors, 15% towels, 40% random armor, 1% syllables.

  • Random armor will be elven toga, gentleman's suit, gentlewoman's dress, jacket, fedora, stilettos, hawaiian shirt, t-shirt, victorian underwear, or black dress.

Enemy Types

66.6% fog clouds, 16.6% piranha, 11.1% sea monsters, 2.7% Coure Eladrin, 2.77% Noviere Eladrin

Portal

The portal to the next level is located in the shallow water outside the walls of Elshava. You can use any portal detection method to find it (including wandering around the shallows until you stumble through it) or you can pay one of the shopkeepers to reveal it.
